snippet.title: 【E3 2019】Bright Memory Infinite GamePlay Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello everyone!
  I would be glad to publish to everybody Bright Memory  Infinite during E3-2019,the video shows the new combat system,you can use different skills against enemies in the air,and In the level design we designed a lot of exciting plots.This video shows the results of three months of development,in addition to improving the gameplay, we will also focus on character model design,in the coming months we will create facial animations of some characters in order to better shape the characters.

  Please enjoy the Bright Memory Infinite GAMEPLAY Trailer!

《Bright Memory: Infinite》 is an FPS-ACT game developed by FYQD-Studio team. For players who have already purchased 《Bright Memory: Episode 1》,the application will automatically upgrade to this new version after complete the Early access version.

《Bright Memory: Infinite》 is still in early stage of development. It is planed to be released on XBOX ONE and PlayStation . PC version will support RTX ray tracing. Please look forward to it!
